data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pont, Adrian C. (2015): Description of a new species of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (Diptera: Fanniidae) and distribution records of the genus from the Caucasus Mountains. Zootaxa 3956 (1): 140-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3956.1.9
